title: The Legend of Korra Original Music From Book One (Soundtrack) -
description:
Here is my FLAC EAC ripped copy of: 

1. The Legend of Korra Original Music From Book One (Soundtrack) 2013

The show is OK, but this album is amazing, even better so if you've never seen the show.


CD was ripped with the utmost care with proper settings with EAC.

The download includes:

1. The flac files for the albums
2. Specrogram screenshots of each individual flac :P
3. EAC cue and log file's
4. Album cover's, although they are already embedded into the songs.


Sample Rate: 44.1kHz 
Sample Size: 16 bit

--------Applied metadata - same as itunes version of album
